mapper.select: /* getPageSearchInterceptorList */ select sps.page_id ,sps.el_nm ,sps.vmodel_id ,sps.fromto_yn ,sps.vmodel_from_id ,sps.calendar_sch_column_nm from SYS_page sp join SYS_page_item sps on sp.page_id = sps.page_id where sp.usg_yn = 'Y' and sp.del_yn = 'N' and sps.usg_yn = 'Y' and sps.del_yn = 'N'
